name: Classy
0:
”Alexa, start classy classroom and check my grades for algebra.”
”What are my english grades?”
”What are my grades in math?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: classy classroom
des: By linking to a Google Classroom account, Classy provides voice access to a list of current courses and grades. With the additional purchase of the Enhanced Access package, Classy can look for homework assignments that will be due soon so you can keep on top of coursework.
